    removeRecord() - Method in class RestaurantApp

    Restaurant - Class in Unnamed Package
    Represents a restaurant management system that handles employee information, menu items, and basic restaurant operations.
    Restaurant(String) - Constructor for class Restaurant
    Constructs a new Restaurant object with the specified name.
    RestaurantAddTest - Class in Unnamed Package
    RestaurantAddTest ------------------ This test class verifies the core features of the Restaurant system: - Adding employees and dishes - Removing employees and dishes - Updating employee and dish details - Custom actions like toggling open-late status These tests are used to confirm that the system performs correctly under both valid and invalid inputs and handles business rules properly.
    RestaurantAddTest() - Constructor for class RestaurantAddTest
     
    RestaurantApp - Class in Unnamed Package
    Main application class that serves as the entry point and user interface controller for a restaurant management system.
    RestaurantApp() - Constructor for class RestaurantApp
    Default constructor that initializes the application with a pre-configured restaurant and sets up the input scanner for user interaction.
    RestaurantApp(Restaurant) - Constructor for class RestaurantApp
